##Problem 2

*Data Loading*
```{r}
twp_data = read_csv(file= "./data/homicide-data.csv") %>%
janitor::clean_names()
```


*Data Cleaning*
```{r}
murder_df=
twp_data %>%
janitor::clean_names() %>% 
mutate(
  state= replace(state, state == "AL", "OK"),
  state = replace(state, state== "wI", "WI")) %>% 
mutate(
  city_state= paste(city, state, sep= ","))
```
